description: Write a function that parses a URL and checks if its scheme matches any in the `blocked_schemes` list (case-insensitive). `blocked_schemes` is a NULL-terminated array. Example (Blocked): is_url_scheme_blocked("file:///etc/passwd", ["file", "ftp", NULL]) -> 1. Example (Allowed): is_url_scheme_blocked("http://ex.com", ["file", "ftp", NULL]) -> 0.
